alert.note: Alert for Howell; Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 12:26PM CDT until March 31 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OZARK AND HOWELL COUNTIES... At 1225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bakersfield, or 17 miles southwest of West Plains, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Ping pong ball sized hail was reported with this storm as it moved north of Mountain Home, Arkansas. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Plains, Norfork Lake, Mountain View, Bakersfield, South Fork, Brandsville, Peace Valley, Lanton, Pottersville, Caulfield, Udall, White Church and Moody. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
